sentences.sentence: The value of China increase greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013, then it decrease with steady steps by 2016; while America, Britain and Japan keep stable between 2010 and 2016.

sentences.sentence: The value of China increase greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013, then it decrease with steady steps by 2016; while America, Britain and Japan keep stable between 2010 and 2016.
